title: What subjects should we learn the most? - Quora

response.answer_text: An understanding of the history of science can enhance your understanding of mathematics, physics and cosmology (other sciences, too, but chemistry, for example requires detailed study for understanding). Continuing reading is also enriching, thought provoking and useful in understanding human nature - not to mention entertaining. It can also lead to hours of good fellowship and discussions.

Any form of study is goal oriented meaning that you have a certain profession in mind. In the end you need to pass all subjects in your course to promote to a higher level. I would focus on the subjects that is going to be essential to my future occupation.
